name: somnambulist/laravel-doctrine-behaviours
description: Alternative Doctrine behaviours for laravel-doctrine extensions. Provides blamable, timestampable and universally identifiable.

suggest.ramsey/uuid-doctrine: Allows using UUID objects in Doctrine entities.
suggest.somnambulist/laravel-doctrine-entity-aud: Full auditing for tracking changes to entity (based on SimpleThings EntityAudit bundle).
